caption.p: Isolation flowchart of the degreasing of Myristica fragrans using antibacterial bioassay-guided fractionation. The structures of myristicin ( 1), (+)- erythro-Δ 8′-7 S,8 R- dihydroxy-3,3′,5′-trimethoxy-8- O-4′-neolignan ( 2), (+)- erythro-Δ 8′-7-hydroxy-3,4,3′,5′-tetramethoxy- 8- O-4′-neolignan ( 3), and e rythro-Δ 8′-7-acetoxy-3,4,3′,5′-tetramethoxy-8- O-4′-neolignan ( 4) are shown. F1 to F10 indicated different eluted fractions.
